body:
I have a problem, I can't view my stats, yes some moderator can solve my problem I would very grateful. Yes some people can view my stats, please say me for know if my problem or the problem of page. Thanks!

title: I can't view my stats

replies.body:
It's a glitch, instead use www.avicus.net/blinksx/stats
Not as detailed, but it still shows the basic stats ^-^

replies.body: As Roman stated, that is always a useful way. The method i use is by going to the All Time leader board and searching my name there.
